meta.title: Define directive collection metadata model
meta.summary: Add explicit collection metadata schema to directive rules so tasks can be grouped and ordered as merge-safe collections.
meta.result: Completed. Collection metadata fields and semantics were added to shared directives model and architect standards, and AGENTS policy now requires collection metadata for multi-task directives.

task.objective: Define and document collection metadata fields for directive sessions and task files.
constraints: Preserve existing status and priority semantics.
Do not introduce ambiguous field names.

steps.instruction: In \'docs/agent-rules/shared/directives-model.md\', add a \'collection\' metadata section defining exact fields and allowed values.
In \'docs/agent-rules/shared/directives-model.md\', add required task-level collection fields and ordering semantics.
In \'docs/agent-rules/architect/directive-standards.md\', require every new task to include collection metadata and merge-safety completion criteria.
In \'AGENTS.md\', add short policy language that collection metadata is mandatory for multi-task directives.
Ensure examples use exact field names and do not conflict with existing meta keys.

expected_output: Directive model docs explicitly define collection metadata and usage rules.
stop_conditions: Stop and ask operator if required collection fields conflict with any existing directive parser or UI assumptions.
